entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RyuJIT: Improving multi-dimensional array accesses #60785
    Future
  • Some .NET 6 runtime assemblies are not R2R images #60782
  • [API Proposal]: Add BigInteger support to System.Text.Json #60780
    7.0.0
  • Add generate crash report flag (and other flags) to WriteDump diagnostics IPC message #60775
    6.0.1
  • HttpStress and SslStress builds are broken on Windows #60769
  • BufferBlock<T>.Completion never completes in specific scenario #60768
  • `new StackTrace()` inside async methods -> Useless, Lack of frames with sync caller method (initiator) #60764
  • Allow customizing letter case size when serializing Unicode characters #60762
  • dotnet 6 rc.2: libhostpolicy.dylib library load disallowed by system policy #60760
  • [API Proposal]: Add ability to get Caller MethodInfo from any code at runtime #60759
  • Linux: NativeLibrary.TryLoad terminates the process when handle parameter does not a real handle to library. #60758
  • [Loc]With .NET6 RTM SDK installed, the texts in CLI are partly unlocalized after running "dotnet --info" #60756
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexCultureTests.TestIgnoreCaseRelationBorderCasesInNonBacktracking(options: NonBacktracking) #60753
    7.0.0
  • Unexpected TimeSeriesLimitReached after HistogramLimitReached #60752

Closed

  • CI failure in profiler.elt.XUnitWrapper test #60790
  • Test failure System.Drawing.Tests.PenTests.Ctor_Brush_Width<SolidBrush>(brush: SolidBrush { Color = Color [Red] }, width: -∞, expectedPenType: SolidColor) #60751
  • System.Text.Json - can't serialize exception #43026
    Future
  • [android] interpreter does not run Java/C# object finalizers in some cases #60638
    6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Indexer to Vectors #59924
    7.0.0
  • Single/Double/Half/Decimal need more test cases for parsing #48119
    Future
  • [blazor] [wasm] Unable to debug after redirect to oidc #60613
    7.0.0
  • ',' is invalid after a single JSON value. Expected end of data. #30405
    Future
  • Are .Net 6.0 dll-s distributed in R2R format? #60779
  • Add System.Text.Json support for BigInteger #60763
    7.0.0
  • Add support for Date/TimeOnly to STJ #51302
    Future
  • System.Text.Json: Improving parsing error experience #51238
    Future
  • JsonSerializerOptions.WriteIndividualObjects #38344
    Future
  • [System.Text.Json] Utf8JsonReader/Writer should support TimeSpan #32965
    Future
  • System.Text.Json support a way to ignore/handle exceptions on serialization #44390
    Future
  • The JSON value could not be converted - Model with nullable DateTime #434
    Future
  • [DllImportGenerator] Remove unnecessary initialization of return values in generated code #60698
    7.0.0
  • DllImportGererator.Unit.Tests Workitem failed in PR with JIT assert #60772
  • System.Text.JsonSerializer - Provide a mechanism to begin deseralization at a specific name/value pair. #49598
    Future
  • Add an option in System.Text.Json to allow control characters within string values #49455
    Future
  • Regressions in Benchstone.BenchI.EightQueens #60629
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<String> #60627
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in SeekUnroll #60626
    7.0.0
  • linq OrderBy<string>() with "-" #60761
  • Add ’root namespace of an assembly‘ API #55791
    Future
  • About the invalid problem that 'Process.GetProcesses().Contains(Process.GetCurrentProcess())'. #56763
    Future
  • Test failure profiler/multiple/multiple/multiple.sh #57906
    7.0.0
  • Analyzer / fixer proposal: Prefer static HashData methods over ComputeHash #40579
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable a couple of pen tests on Windows on release/6.0 #60789
    area-System.Drawing
  • ci arm test #60788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hide 'align' instruction behind jmp #60787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More stack overflow avoidance in regex NonBacktracking #60786
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Optimize PersianCalendar.AddMonths calculations #60778
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix mono_get_generic_context_from_stack_frame when it's from a dim. #60770
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add unit test for variable length encoding HTTP/3 #60766
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Fix libs.tests build with gcc #60757
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add AggressiveInlining attribute to multi-dimension array helpers #60750

Merged

  • Use Math.CopySign in CalendricalCalculationsHelper #60776
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Maui File location and target runtime updates #60784
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • API Implementation: Add Indexer to Vectors #60517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve IndexOfAny(byte,byte,byte) #40894
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Disable tests that are failing with JIT asserts on ARM64 #60773
    disabled-test, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix loading a non wasm page and then returning to a wasm page. #60777
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Add check for running under translation to mac installers #60771
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/5.0] Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60496
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • Remove xunit-performance dependency in tests #60711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix loading a non wasm page and then returning to a wasm page. #60688
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [DllImportGenerator] Remove unnecessary initialization of variables in generated code #60748
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Remove exclusions to bad paths #60744
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Turn off reloc generation for handles #60721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add general multi-dimensional array test #60749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify runtime test projects #60724
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable additional llvmfullaot Linux_arm64 CI lane #60730
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add limited support for backtracking Regex single char loops to simplified code gen #60385
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix GCC warnings in test build #60734
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Updated tests regarding issue #48119 #52994
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: some enhancements to redundant branch opts #60732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][EXPERIMENT] [wasm][aot] link with O1 #60739
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [hackathon] [testonly] ValueArray - a compliment type to the Span, which owns its data without indirections. #60608
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement `GT_AND_NOT` for ARM/ARM64 #59881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.1
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOSSimulator #58870
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #59389
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Test stateless pools #60704
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Do not throw StackOverflow exception from `ChangeToken.OnChange` #60198
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Use preferred region from PAL for JIT reloc hints #60747
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add HttpClient.PatchAsJsonAsync() apis #60672
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Attempt to fix observed AV in mark_through_cards_for_segments #60617
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Allow interp->jit transitions for generic methods. #60461
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [WIP] Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
